Poetic Translation: I am come from the poplars, Mother,

Lyrics: de ver cómo los menea el ayre.
Poetic Translation: And I saw how in the wind they shudder.

Poetic Translation: From Seville with poplars so lovely,

Lyrics: de ver a mi linda amiga,
Poetic Translation: Where I went to see my honey,

Lyrics: de ver cómo los menea el ayre.
Poetic Translation: And I saw how in the wind they shudder.
